metadata.description: The unique guid for this Analytics Rule

properties.displayName: [WASOC-Intelligence] a known phishing url has been accessed by a user - DeviceEvents
properties.description: The rules detects potentially successful DeviceEvents where Browser is launched to open Url's that match Indicators of Compromise (IOC) from WASOC Threat Intelligence feed.
properties.query:
let dt_lookback = 1h;
let ioc_lookback = 14d;
// URL normalizer for parse_url()
let NormalizeUrl = (u:string) {
    case(isempty(u), u, u startswith "http://", u, u startswith "https://", u,
        // default to https if missing scheme
        strcat("https://", u))};
let DeviceEvents_ = DeviceEvents
    | where TimeGenerated >= ago(dt_lookback)
    | where isnotempty(RemoteUrl)
    | where ActionType == "BrowserLaunchedToOpenUrl"
    | where RemoteUrl startswith "http"
    | extend RemoteUrl_decoded = url_decode(RemoteUrl)
    | extend parsed_url = parse_url(tolower(RemoteUrl_decoded))
    | extend parsed_url_host = tostring(parsed_url.Host), parsed_url_path = tostring(parsed_url.Path)
    | where isnotempty(parsed_url_host) 
    | where isnotempty(parsed_url_path)
    | project-rename DeviceEvents_TimeGenerated = TimeGenerated;
let TI = ThreatIntelIndicators
    |where TimeGenerated >= ago(ioc_lookback)
    //Use only WASOC-Government-ISAC feed
| where SourceSystem == "WASOC-Government-ISAC" and Tags contains "phishing"
| extend IndicatorType = replace(@"\[|\]|\""", "", tostring(split(ObservableKey, ":", 0)))
| where IndicatorType == "url"
| extend TI_Url = tolower(ObservableValue)
| extend TI_UrlNorm = NormalizeUrl(TI_Url)
| extend parsed_ioc = parse_url(TI_UrlNorm)
| extend parsed_ioc_host = tostring(parsed_ioc.Host), parsed_ioc_path = tostring(parsed_ioc.Path)
| extend TrafficLightProtocolLevel = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalFields).TLPLevel)
| extend IndicatorId = tostring(split(Id, "--")[2])
| summarize LatestIndicatorTime = arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Id, ObservableValue
;
DeviceEvents_
|join kind=inner TI on $left.parsed_url_host == $right.parsed_ioc_host, $left.parsed_url_path == $right.parsed_ioc_path
| where DeviceEvents_TimeGenerated < ValidUntil
| summarize DeviceEvents_TimeGenerated = arg_max(DeviceEvents_TimeGenerated, *) by Id, TI_Url
| extend Description = tostring(parse_json(Data).description)
| extend ActivityGroupNames = extract(@"ActivityGroup:(\S+)", 1, tostring(parse_json(Data).labels))
|summarize by DeviceEvents_TimeGenerated, Id, ObservableValue, Confidence, Description, Type, Tags, TrafficLightProtocolLevel, ActionType, DeviceId, DeviceName, InitiatingProcessAccountUpn, InitiatingProcessCommandLine, RemoteUrl
| extend Name = tostring(split(InitiatingProcessAccountUpn, '@', 0)[0]), UPNSuffix = tostring(split(InitiatingProcessAccountUpn, '@', 1)[0])
| extend HostName_ = tostring(split(DeviceName, '.', 0)[0])
| extend timestamp = DeviceEvents_TimeGenerated, UserPrincipalName = InitiatingProcessAccountUpn

alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: [WASOC-Intelligence] a known phishing url has been accessed by user - DeviceEvents
alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat:
The rules detects potentially successful DeviceEvents where Browser is launched to open Url's that match Indicators of Compromise (IOC) from WASOC Threat Intelligence feed.
TLP: {{TrafficLightProtocolLevel}}
IOC Description: {{Description}}
IOC Value: ```{{ObservableValue}}```
